name: Arcade
description: Arcade is an oscilloscope themed robot belonging to the WebtrES club. With its vibrant orange box and classic buttons, it is a nostalgic throwback to retro gaming. Its arms and legs are designed like rockets, allowing it to move with agility and precision. The screen displays a fun and interactive snake game, providing entertainment and practicality. As an added accessory, Arcade wears a protective helmet, ensuring its safety during adventurous missions.
